Title: The Headaches of Leading Your Own Business
Description:
Today, we hear from:

•      A business owner wondering how much cash she needs to hire her first team member

•      A solopreneur wanting to know how to reduce the taxes his business pays

•      A son seeking advice on the succession plan for his dad’s business

•      A framing contractor struggling with cash flow since he keeps getting paid late
